code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:female retired aged 75 years presents with mild headaches particularly at the back of the head and in the morning for more than 6 weeks. o:Height 69 in, Weight 132 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 152, DiastolicBP 96, Respiration 19, Heart = 2/6 systolic murmur at base of heart, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = no edema or clubbing, Heart = normal S1, S2, RRR a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid panel.

Value.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

content2.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

td.content: s:white F aged 77 ys with C/O mild headaches particularly at the back of the head and in the morning for 7 days that is frequent. patient also reports mild spells of vertigo, mild occasional lightheadedness. o:Height 69 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 150, DiastolicBP 95, Respiration 16, Heart = 2/6 systolic murmur at base of heart, Chest = clear to auscultation B/L, no rales or wheezing, Extremities = no edema or clubbing, Heart = normal S1, S2, RRR a:Hypertension p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed nifedipine - 10 mg 3 x day, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Lipid panel.

Value.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel

content2.Value: ordered Basic Metabolic Panel , Lipid panel
